schedule.name: Morning Brief
schedule.desc: AI news, printing trends, OpenClaw tips, App of the Day, and your ONE priority for today. Sent to Telegram.

schedule.name: Daily Push (Goal-Driven)
schedule.desc: Picks ONE task from your 8 goals using a scoring algorithm (momentum × effort × energy). Developer Mode format — exact steps, clear done criteria.

schedule.name: Afternoon Research
schedule.desc: Searches for 2-3 printing industry news items, trends, or competitor moves. Sent to Telegram with why it matters for INKredible.

schedule.name: Daily Journaling
schedule.desc: Gentle end-of-day check-in. What got done, one reflection question. Low-pressure, 3-5 lines. Sent to Telegram.

schedule.name: Daily Standup Meeting
schedule.desc: Your daily meeting with ChetGPT. What happened today, project status, decisions needed (yes/no format), tomorrow's priority. Sent to Telegram.

schedule.name: Nightly Work
schedule.desc: Silent overnight work session. Picks highest-impact task from roadmap, does the work, logs results. No Telegram — you see results in morning brief.

schedule.name: Invoice Extraction
schedule.desc: Extracts line items from vendor PDF invoices using AI. Builds pricing database for the MIS. 109 PDFs remaining. Silent.

schedule.name: Autonomous Work Loop
schedule.desc: Picks tasks from your goal roadmap and works on them continuously. Coding, research, file organization. Silent — logs to daily memory file.

schedule.name: Weekly Memory Distill
schedule.desc: Compresses daily notes older than 3 days. Keeps key decisions and outcomes, moves raw logs to archive. Keeps memory lean.

schedule.name: Weekly Optimization Scan
schedule.desc: Researches latest OpenClaw tips, token optimization tricks, and community patterns. Finds ways to make the system faster and cheaper.

schedule.name: Weekly Unknown Unknowns
schedule.desc: Blind spot audit. What should we be doing but aren't? What tools exist that you've never used? What decisions are we avoiding? Sent to Telegram.

schedule.name: Weekly Goal Review
schedule.desc: Assesses all 8 of your goals. Which got attention this week? Which got zero? Adjusts priority scores. Silent — Brain reviews and shares relevant parts.

buildFreeze.reason: Aviel-mandated: verify and use everything built this week before building anything new
